job.title: Looking for a .NET Senior Developer | React Developer
job.description:
Job description
• Experience in Microsoft .Net technologies C# .Net,
• Having worked in.NET Core 3.0 and above
• Mainly middle tiers (IE not front ends)
• Experience of TypeScript
• Having work on either React or Angular
• Experience in the middle tiers or front end is useful
• For both .Net and TypeScript essential experience
• Building libraries and API's
• TDD so Unit Testing, Dependency Injection
• RESTful APIs and micro services
• Optional but useful experience
• Docker/containers/k8s
• Messaging

Role: Full Stack Developer (React | .NET | C#)
Industry Type: IT Services & Consulting
Department: Engineering - Software & QA
Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent
Role Category: Software Development

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced .NET Senior Developer who is also proficient in React. This is a long-term project, with an estimated duration of more than 6 months. 

The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of the .NET Framework, ASP.NET, React, C#, and ASP.NET MVC. They will be responsible for developing and maintaining our web applications, implementing new features, and troubleshooting any issues that may arise. 

To be considered for this position, please submit a detailed proposal outlining how you can contribute to this project. We would like you to provide examples of past completed projects that showcase your expertise in both .NET and React. Additionally, include links to these projects so we can review your work firsthand. 

We look forward to receiving your proposals and finding the perfect candidate to join our team.
customFields.inputsTitleAI: Looking for a .NET Senior Developer | React Developer
customFields.finalDescriptionAI:
As a .NET Senior Developer, you will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining our software solutions. Your responsibilities will include:

Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Writing clean, scalable, and efficient code using the .NET framework.
Troubleshooting, debugging, and resolving issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
Mentoring junior developers and sharing best practices within the team.
Keeping up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the .NET ecosystem.
Requirements:

Strong proficiency in C# and the .NET framework.
Extensive experience with ASP.NET MVC/WebAPI.
Familiarity with SQL Server and database design principles.
Experience with version control systems such as Git.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (preferred).
Position: React Developer

As a React Developer, you will be responsible for building user interfaces for web applications using React.js. Your responsibilities will include:

Developing new user-facing features using React.js.
Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
Collaborating with backend developers to integrate front-end and backend services seamlessly.
Requirements:

Proficiency in JavaScript and React.js.
Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and responsive web design principles.
Experience with state management libraries such as Redux or MobX.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (preferred).
Why Join Us?

Opportunity to work on challenging projects that impact millions of users.
Collaborative and inclusive work environment where your ideas are valued.
Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.
Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
If you are passionate about software development and eager to take on new challenges, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and portfolio (if applicable) to [email address] with the subject line "Application for .NET Senior Developer" or "Application for React Developer," depending on the position you are applying for.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. We look forward to reviewing your application and potentially welcoming you to our team.
